bio: Adoption strategist and researcher, pushing for increased accountability by advancing impact evaluation.
contributionDescription:
- Onboarded 2 communities in Latam to adopt the generation of data for their members through Attestations that can be leveraged into their Optimist profiles.
- Supported 6 projects in their application process to RetroPGF3
- Held a workshop on on-chain identity creation in the Optimism Ecosystem
- Held a workshop in Spanish on applying to RetroPGF and the creation of high signal-impact metrics
- Created awareness of Impact Evaluation Metrics across channels.

Contributed to HER LATAM's mission to guide Latam communities, particularly women-centered, on how to contribute to the Optimism Collective. 
- Held workshop on Public Goods funding available mechanisms and generating targeted impact to Optimism
- Held 5 tailored 1:1 sessions for projects in Latam to identify opportunities.

contributionLinks.description: Workshop on Public Goods Funding and the Impact = Profit axiom
Discovery Session resource for PGs projects developing a funding strategy
Workshop in Spanish on how to apply to RetroPGF3 with impact metrics
1:1 Sessions to create a strategy on how to contribute to the Optimism Ecosystem
Merged improvements to the Optimism website
Resources on how to improve impact metrics

impactDescription:
Increase in Optimism Citizen data availability:
- 6 new schemas created by communities to attest to their engagements.
- New OP attestation data generated for over 150 individuals in LATAM. 

Adoption of high-signal impact metrics for RetroPGF3 by applicants:
- 6 RetroPGF3 applicants leveraging on-chain data or 
Optimism contract data to back up their Impact on the OP Ecosystem.
- 1 Script created by workshop attendee to trace on-chain long-term engagement of their onboarded members (which is data being used in their RetroPGF application).

Mission results (so far):
- Ethereum Edmonton held their first Optimism-centric meetup

impactMetrics.description: Number of EAS schemas used and created

fundingSources.description: From the HER LATAM Mission locked until mid 2024

pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, Blockchain Infrastructure, Adoption & Impact Evaluation
